title: The Husband Lost at Sea
marks:
Signed, dated, numbered, chopmark LR: [T.L. Solien \'85]
LL: [State Proof]
description: Multiple scene print; L panel: silhouette of a 2-masted boat afloat; R panel: a seabed with rocks and vegetation; bottom panel: a seabed with foreign objects (presumably vestiges of a boat) lodged in the sand
creditline: Vermillion Archival Collection, Gift of Mr. and Mrs. George McKay Reid
